Snoop onto them as they snoop onto us.

1984? Yeah right, man. That's a typo. Orwell is here now. He's livin' large.
Snoop onto them as they snoop onto us.
Mess with the best, die like the rest.
puns: That dependency is so sketchy, even my paranoia is paranoid.

That's a wrap(per)! Get it? Because npm packages?
This package has more dependencies than I have conspiracy theories. And that's saying something.
